overview: The alarm clock. The personal computer. The smartphone. The radio. You know the greatest gadgets of all time (and youâ€™ve probably owned most of them), but which has changed the world more than any other? To make our list of 101, a gadget had to be something you could hold in your hands, mechanical or electronic, and a mass-produced personal item. The rest was up to the judges. Check out our selections.
title: 101 Gadgets That Changed the World
